mapper.select: SELECT f.FREE_NO, f.FREE_TITLE, f.FREE_CONTENT, f.FREE_CREATE_DATE, f.FREE_MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_NO, nickname, f.FREE_STATUS, f1.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME AS FILE_UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, f1.STORE_FILE_NAME AS FILE_STORE_FILE_NAME, f2.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME AS IMAGE_UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, f2.STORE_FILE_NAME AS IMAGE_STORE_FILE_NAME FROM free f LEFT JOIN filestore f1 ON f.FREE_NO = f1.BOARD_NO AND f1.FILE_LEVEL = 3 AND f1.BOARD_TYPE = 'FREE' LEFT JOIN filestore f2 ON f.FREE_NO = f2.BOARD_NO AND f2.FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND f2.BOARD_TYPE = 'FREE' left join member using(member_no) where free_no = #{freeNo} and free_status = 'Y'
